## What is cloud computing?

> "A kind of Internet-based computing that provides shared processing resources and data to computers and other devices on demand" [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloud_computing)

## Why use it?

**Freedom!**  
Free yourself from the shackles of working on a single device.

**Collaboration!**  
Collaborate with colleagues on a file with ease.

**Interaction!**
Interact with other people and services all over the world.

**Peace of Mind**  
Rest easy knowing that your files are backed up and secure*.

*sort of...
